name: Barber Shop Beard Salon 3d
description:
Spice up your mustache and beard styles in this barber shop game for boys! So have you ever dreamed of becoming a hairdresser in hair salon barber shop? Think you can shave a man with a cut-throat razor? Can you shape his beard just the way he wants it in your own barber shop? Can you change the mess of his beard into something truly unique and amazing? Then this is the right place for pro barbers, who love to make beard styles into numerous inimitable crazy shave! Get ready for your exciting day at barber shop with beard shave and mustache hair cutting! Make a good impression so that customers will keep coming back for more! Run own barber shop and help young boys look perfect after makeover!

If you ever dreamed to make unique beard styles, then this game is made exactly for you! Try on the image of a crazy barbarian, shave beard, make styles and have fun! Customers don't just want beard shaved off also give them perfect mustache and beard styles that makes them look and feel like a real man. Work as pro barbarian with a sharp blade and steady hand! Cut, shave and style beard using your creativity. World’s most famous hair dressers are waiting for you to give beard styles!
So prepare yourself to perform this challenging job of barbarian!

Features:
• Challenging hair barber shop level!
• Various styling tools like trimmers, scissor, comb, electric razor & much more!
• Chance to become a real barber!
• Professional inspired products and hair dresser!
• Attractive gameplay and sound effects!

Download this game and give us your feedback, so we can make more new barber games for you.
